name: Oscillo Box
description: Oscillo Box is a robotic oscilloscope with a vibrant red body color called Rosso Corsa. It has a playful and mischievous personality, reminiscent of a cat. Oscillo Box is a member of the WebtrES club, a community of robots exploring the depths of the internet. With its foundry arms and legs, it is both sturdy and agile. The screen on its body displays a mesmerizing snake pattern, adding a touch of style to its appearance. Oscillo Box also wears stylish glasses that give it a sophisticated look.
